p: In comparison of our study with other studies form Pakistan, the JI ranged from 12.25 to 0.37 ( Table 4). The highest JI (12.25) was found with previous report from Central Punjab [ 4], followed by the study conducted in Layyah, Punjab, Pakistan [ 125] with 5.61 JI, Swat, KPK, Pakistan [ 58] with 3.70 JI, Gujrat, Pakistan [ 126] with 3.63 JI and Hafizabad Punjab, Pakistan [ 36] with 3.63 JI. The lowest JI such as 0.37, 0.46, and 0.47 was recorded from Abbatobad, KPK, Pakistan [ 21], Hungu, Pakistan [ 73], and Mohmand Agency, FATA, Pakistan [ 51], respectively. Our study shares the greatest number of common species (53) with the study from Central Punjab, Pakistan [ 4] with 71.7% similar uses and 28.3% dissimilar uses ( Table 4). Similarly, 11 species are common between our study and a study form Layyah, Punjab, Pakistan that reported a total of 78 species [ 125] with 7 species having similar uses and 5 species having dissimilar uses. 8 species, in our study, were found common to the studies reported from Gujrat, Punjab, Pakistan [ 126], Hafizabad, Punjab, Pakistan [ 36], and Swat, KPK, Pakistan [ 58] where a total of 88, 85 and 83 species, respectively, were recorded. Other studies from Pakistan only share 1 to 4 species common to our study.
